subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Tubby Smith inherits a team that went 9-22 last season and 3-13 in the Big Ten. The Gophers were overmatched nearly every time they played, sending their fan base away in droves.
snippet: Tubby Smith inherits a team that went 9-22 last season and 3-13 in the Big Ten. The Gophers were overmatched nearly every time they played, sending their fan base away in droves.
